turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can I get a mocha frappucino with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What location are you ordering to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: To the Starbucks on Mass Ave in Central Square.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, very good. What size would you like for your frappucino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, a grande frappucino. Is that a mocha frap?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me ask my friend, because it's for her. Hold on a moment?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, she does want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make it light whipped cream though?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Light whipped cream, absolutely. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK then, your order will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the receipt has already been sent to your phone.n

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thanks. Oh, before I forget: could I get an extra straw with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. Thanks again and have a good day.
